glsa.title: NVIDIA Drivers: Privilege Escalation
glsa.synopsis: A NVIDIA drivers bug allows unprivileged user-mode software to access the GPU inappropriately, allowing for privilege escalation.

background.p: The NVIDIA drivers provide X11 and GLX support for NVIDIA graphic boards.

description.p: The vulnerability is caused due to the driver allowing unprivileged user-mode software to access the GPU.

impact.p: A local attacker could gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
